name: Monkey Run (yanglin_tao)
description:
David is a young, naughty monkey who enjoys bananas very much. However, he realizes that the only way he could get more bananas is to enter the gorilla's territory.  The gorillas are very angry about David, therefore the tension between them has come to a new level. To escape the gorillas and collect bananas, David was chased from grassland to the sea and eventually, they ended up in space. 

The player will be able to help David escape and collect bananas. Life packets and bombs will spawn randomly for health supplement and powerups.

Link to GitHub repo: https://github.com/Mitchellzhou1/Exercise4/tree/Final-Branch

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDuuXJK-K6RCW32JKJwJYgw

Attributes

Level 1 Music:

  • Happy Comedy Halloween Party Dance for Kids Children by Sound Gallery By Dmitry Taras
  • Cartoon biting by ZapSplat
  • Gorilla yell by Aigei.com
  • Hit sound by Aigei.com

Level 3 Music

  • Background Music: https://soundimage.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/Automation.mp3
  • The following sounds were taken from : https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/arcade/?page=1
    • Shooting Sound: Quick Arcade Jump
    • Game Over: Arcade Retro Game Over
    • Explosion Sound: 8-Bit-Bomb Explosion
